summary: Delete an installation for the authenticated app
description:
Uninstalls a GitHub App on a user, organization, or business account.

You must use a [JWT](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.20/apps/building-github-apps/authenticating-with-github-apps/#authenticating-as-a-github-app) to access this endpoint.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description: This API is under preview and subject to change.

previews.name: gambit
previews.note:
Uninstalling GitHub Apps and revoking an app's installation token are currently available for developers to preview. To access the new endpoint during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.20/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:
```shell
application/vnd.github.gambit-preview+json
```

previews.name: machine-man
previews.note:
To access the API with your GitHub App, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.20/v3/media) in the `Accept` Header for your requests.
```shell
application/vnd.github.machine-man-preview+json
```
